mapper.sql: ID, NAME, PROVIDER_INFO, CELLPHONE, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, REGION_ID, REGISTER_TIME, STATUS, WEIXIN, QQ, WORK_TIME, EMAIL, RECOMMEND, PROVIDER_INTRODUCE,PROVIDER_IMG, AUTH_FILE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from provider
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into provider (ID, NAME, PROVIDER_INFO, CELLPHONE, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, REGION_ID, REGISTER_TIME, STATUS, WEIXIN, QQ, WORK_TIME, EMAIL, RECOMMEND, PROVIDER_INTRODUCE, PROVIDER_IMG, AUTH_FILE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{providerIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerImg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, #{authFile,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})

mapper.update:
update provider
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_INFO = #{record.providerInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CELLPHONE = #{record.cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_ID = #{record.loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGION_ID = #{record.regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_TIME = #{record.registerTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

QQ = #{record.qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_TIME = #{record.workTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PROVIDER_IMG = #{record.providerImg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
AUTH_FILE = #{record.authFile,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},

update provider set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER_INFO = #{record.providerInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CELLPHONE = #{record.cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_ID = #{record.loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION_ID = #{record.regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTER_TIME = #{record.registerTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WEIXIN = #{record.weixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ = #{record.qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_TIME = #{record.workTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECOMMEND = #{record.recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVIDER_INTRODUCE = #{record.providerIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER_IMG = #{record.providerImg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, AUTH_FILE = #{record.authFile,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}

update provider
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_INFO = #{providerInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CELLPHONE = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_ID = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_TIME = #{registerTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEIXIN = #{weixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_TIME = #{workTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECOMMEND = #{recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROVIDER_INTRODUCE = #{providerIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_IMG = #{providerImg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
AUTH_FILE = #{authFile,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update provider set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER_INFO = #{providerInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CELLPHONE = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_ID = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTER_TIME = #{registerTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WEIXIN = #{weixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_TIME = #{workTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECOMMEND = #{recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVIDER_INTRODUCE = #{providerIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER_IMG = #{providerImg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, AUTH_FILE = #{authFile,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from provider where name like '%${likeName}%' and status=${status}

select * from provider where name like '%${likeName}%' and status=${status}
limit ${pageSize},${pageNum}
mapper.update: update provider set PROVIDER_IMG = #{providerImg} where ID = #{id}
update provider set AUTH_FILE = #{authFile} where ID = #{id}
